comments.author: Dave
comments.body: This ride is a helluva lot easier on Google Earth. And the resolution is much better. Think I'll just stay in the office and heat up a mouse pad... I'll meet you guys at the top. (Kidding; see ya' Friday!)

comments.author: Terry
comments.body: hmm... sounds like a good chance to get some "base" training in and try my new HRM. (geesh, i never expected i'd be talking about base miles or even own a HRM! i've been assimilated). anyway, i'll be patiently spinning on my hardtail while you speed/road freaks pass me on the way up. terry

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Was that bike mangled in Photoshop?!?
